node.name: StreamingProject
node.description: This Docker Compose project establishes a data pipeline with Apache Spark, Kafka, Cassandra, MySQL, and Superset. Engineered for real-time processing of streaming data, it stores results in distributed databases and offers visualization through Superset dashboards.
